alert.note: Alert for Red Lodge Foothills (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 7:47PM MST until January 07 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Winds gusting 35 to 50 mph along with blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Red Lodge Foothills. * WHEN...Until noon MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Winds will increase overnight through Friday morning with gusts of 35 to 50 mph. These winds combined with fresh snow will create areas of blowing snow, reducing visibility significantly at times. Drifting snow will keep roadways slick and will make travel on rural roads difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at http://www.weather.gov/billings
